actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize funds for the completion of certain comprehensive river basin plans for flood control, navigation, and other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations for the completion of comprehensive plans of development for specified river basins throughout the United States. Includes completion of local flood protection in the Columbia River Basin under the Act's authorization.

titles.title: A bill to authorize funds for the completion of certain comprehensive river basin plans for flood control, navigation, and other purposes.
